name: Second Floor
data1: Welcome to Computer Engineering Department UoP
data2: The Head of the departmnt is Prof.Roshan Ragel

name: Technical Offcer's room
more: This room is used by Technical officer and assistant.Mr.Kelum is currently incharge in here
features: This room has a Hardware component storage

name: Insructors' Room
more: This is the room for Instructors and Past Graduate students
features: This room has working space for four

name: Industrial Automation Laboratory
more: This lab is used for related lab activities
features: This lab has PLC Boards, Industrial Conveyor Belts

name: Discussion Room
more: This room is used to have discussions of projects,activities etc
features: This has a space for 30 students and  White Boards and study tables are availbale

name: Main Room
more: The lift or the staircases to enter other floors can be accessed from here
features: Entrance and the Exit points are in here

name: Lift
more: Can be used to enter other floors

name: Corridor
more: This corridor can be used to reach discussion room,Hardware & CI lab,TO room and Main room

name: Hardware & Computer Interfacing Lab
more: This lab is used for Digital Design, Embedded Systems and other courses
features: This lab contains 30 Computers, Oscilloscopes, Power Supplies, Signal Generators
